thread.title: Mark Adams
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Mark Adams

author: Mark Adams
title: Mark Adams
text: I recently received my first shipment from Matboard and More. I was immediately impressed by the quality of the work. I made a custom order, which I assumed would take longer to fill, but everything arrived quickly and just as great as I hoped it would look. I have used other suppliers in the past, but I feel confident that I am now going to make future orders through Matboard and More. Thanks for the first rate service!
